Package net.minestom.server.timer

Class Task

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.timer.Task
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
An Object that represents a task that is scheduled for execution on the application.

Tasks are built in SchedulerManager and scheduled by a TaskBuilder.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task​(@NotNull SchedulerManager schedulerManager, @NotNull java.lang.Runnable runnable, boolean shutdown, long delay, long repeat)
      Creates a task.
      Parameters:
      schedulerManager - The manager for the task
      runnable - The task to run when scheduled
      shutdown - Defines whether the task is a shutdown task
      delay - The time to delay
      repeat - The time until the repetition

      @NotNull public TaskStatus getStatus()
      Gets the current status of the task.
      Returns:
      the current stats of the task

    • cancel

      public void cancel()
      Cancels this task. If the task is already running, the thread in which it is running is interrupted. If the task is not currently running, Minestom will safely terminate it.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the id of this task.

      the task id
